text: Lucjan Avgustini (August 28, 1963 - May 22, 2016) was an Albanian prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was the Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Sapë. Avgustini was born in Ferizaj, SFR Yugoslavia. Avgustini was a priest of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Prizren from 1989 to 2006. In 2006, he was made the Bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Sapë in Albania. Avgustini died on May 22, 2016 from a brain tumor in Vau i Dejës, Albania, aged 52. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Albanian people Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Lucjan Avgustini
